exercises.name: reverseArray
exercises.description: Create a function that reverses an array without using the built-in reverse method

exercises.name: createWordFrequencyCounter
exercises.description: Create a function that counts the frequency of each word in a string

exercises.name: removeDuplicates
exercises.description: Create a function that removes duplicate values from an array

exercises.name: findIntersection
exercises.description: Create a function that finds the intersection of two arrays (common elements)

exercises.name: createImmutablePoint
exercises.description: Create a function that returns an immutable 2D point object

exercises.name: groupByProperty
exercises.description: Create a function that groups objects in an array by a specified property

exercises.name: mergeObjects
exercises.description: Create a function that deeply merges two objects

exercises.name: createStack
exercises.description: Implement a stack data structure with push, pop, and peek operations

exercises.name: findMostFrequent
exercises.description: Find the most frequently occurring element in an array

exercises.name: filterObject
exercises.description: Create a function that filters an object based on a predicate function
